scripts.dev:setupenv: npm install http-server && npm install && pip install flask && pip install pipenv && pipenv install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev:start-fe" "npm run dev:start-be" "npm run dev:start-db" "start start.bat"
scripts.update_dev-be_1: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_dev_s3_get_default_inputs --s3-bucket dev-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key get_default_inputs/get_default_inputs.zip
scripts.update_dev-be_2: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_dev_s3_get_inputs --s3-bucket dev-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key get_inputs/get_inputs.zip
scripts.update_dev-be_3: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_dev_s3_get_outputs --s3-bucket dev-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key get_outputs/get_outputs.zip
scripts.update_dev-be_4: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_dev_s3_run_plan --s3-bucket dev-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key run_plan/run_plan.zip
scripts.update_dev-be_5: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_dev_s3_save_plan --s3-bucket dev-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key save_plan/save_plan.zip
scripts.build_and_deploy_dev_fe: npm run build_dev-fe && npm run deploy_dev-fe
scripts.build_and_deploy_dev_be: npm run build_dev-be && npm run deploy_dev-be_1 && npm run update_dev-be_1 && npm run update_dev-be_2 && npm run update_dev-be_3 && npm run update_dev-be_4 && npm run update_dev-be_5
scripts.build_and_deploy_dev_all: npm run build_and_deploy_dev_fe && npm run build_and_deploy_dev_be
scripts.update_prod-be_1: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_prod_s3_get_default_inputs --s3-bucket prod-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key get_default_inputs/get_default_inputs.zip
scripts.update_prod-be_2: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_prod_s3_get_inputs --s3-bucket prod-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key get_inputs/get_inputs.zip
scripts.update_prod-be_3: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_prod_s3_get_outputs --s3-bucket prod-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key get_outputs/get_outputs.zip
scripts.update_prod-be_4: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_prod_s3_run_plan --s3-bucket prod-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key run_plan/run_plan.zip
scripts.update_prod-be_5: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name WFO_prod_s3_save_plan --s3-bucket prod-wfo-lambda-code --s3-key save_plan/save_plan.zip
scripts.build_and_deploy_prod_fe: npm run build_prod-fe && npm run deploy_prod-fe
scripts.build_and_deploy_prod_be: npm run build_prod-be && npm run deploy_prod-be && npm run update_prod-be_1 && npm run update_prod-be_2 && npm run update_prod-be_3 && npm run update_prod-be_4 && npm run update_prod-be_5
